data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gueltekin, Levent, Alonso-Zarazaga, Miguel A. (2013): Larinus berti sp. n. (Coleoptera, Curculionidae, Lixinae) from North Africa. ZooKeys 342: 21-28, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.342.5754, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.342.5754
